titleStmt.title: Six philosophical essays upon several subjects ... by S.P. Gent. of Trinity Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Samuel, 1640-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for Tho. Newborough,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
(from t.p.) I. Dr. Burnet's theory of the earth -- II. Wit and beauty -- III. A publick spirit -- IV. The weather -- V. The certainty of things -- VI. The Cartesian idea of God.
